itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, June 19, 2013
contentencoded:
Facebook is gearing up to hold a big press event tomorrow. So far the topic is under wraps, but the company says "a small team has been working on a big idea."

Will Oremus, tech blogger at Slate, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to share what rumors are swirling around ahead of the meeting.
title: Rumors swirl ahead of Facebook announcement
